meanings.sent1: The embossable paper had a raised design on it.
meanings.sent2: The embossable leather had a beautiful pattern pressed into it.
meanings.sent3: The embossable card looked like it had tiny mountains on it.
meanings.sent4: Her embossable artwork stood out like a 3D sculpture.
meanings.sent5: The embossable material felt bumpy to the touch.

meanings.definition: Able to be raised in relief on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The embossable logo on the book cover was eye-catching.
meanings.sent2: The embossable seal on the certificate added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The embossable pattern on the wall seemed to pop out at you.
meanings.sent4: His embossable initials on the letter gave it a sophisticated look.
meanings.sent5: The embossable design on the cake made it look luxurious.
